system.description:
Every start of your Riff, you gain a 1 Gahom, a mote of fulminating spiritual power primed for destruction. When you make a faith attack, you can spend Gahom to add +1d to the attack per Gahom spent. You can spend 1 Beat to meditate and gain 1 Gahom.

While you have 3+ Gahom, your Thunderbolt Body overwhelms you: start Floating and all your area attacks become Overwhelming and Skewering.

If you ever gain 6 Gahom, your spiritual power overwhelms you and bursts from you: you gain 1 Wound and lose all HP, then inflict 3 True Hits to all enemies in burst 5.
system.flavor: Busalian eventually learn the ritual to become like the gods they've bargained with, a form of shape shifting.
